mapper.select:
--retrieveSpaceYyList 년도조회
SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS yy FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND CMPL_DT IS NOT NULL AND CMPL_DT !='' GROUP BY LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) ORDER BY LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) DESC

--getSpaceBzdvStatList 담당자별통계 조회
select sa_user ,sa_name ,INFM_PRSN_ID ,isnull(last_acpc,0) as last_acpc ,isnull(this_all_acpc,0) as this_all_acpc ,isnull(this_acpc,0) as this_acpc ,isnull(this_ing,0) as this_ing ,isnull(this_drop,0) as this_drop ,isnull(this_cmpl,0) as this_cmpl ,isnull(dd_avg,0) as dd_avg ,isnull(cmpl_p,0) as cmpl_p from IRIS_SSO_USER ssouser left join (select INFM_PRSN_ID ,last_acpc ,this_all_acpc ,this_acpc ,this_ing ,this_drop ,this_cmpl ,case when this_cmpl=0 then 0 else dd_cnt/this_cmpl end as dd_avg ,case when last_acpc+this_all_acpc=0 then 0 else round( this_cmpl/convert(float,(last_acpc+this_all_acpc))*100, 1) end as cmpl_p --완료율 from (select main.INFM_PRSN_ID ,sum(main.this_all_acpc) as this_all_acpc ,sum(main.this_acpc) as this_acpc ,sum(main.last_acpc) as last_acpc ,sum(main.this_ing) as this_ing ,sum(main.this_cmpl) as this_cmpl ,sum(main.this_drop) as this_drop ,sum(DD_CNT) as DD_CNT from (select crgr.INFM_PRSN_ID ,mst.ACPC_DT ,LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.ACPC_DT,23),7) as thin_acpc_mon ,LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar, DATEADD(M, -1, ACPC_DT), 23),7) as last_acpc_mon ,LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.space_RDCS_DT,23),7) as this_cmpl_mon ,LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.space_DCAC_DT,23),7) as this_drop_mon ,mst.space_ACPC_ST_CD ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.ACPC_DT,23),7) between #{fromCmplDt} and #{toCmplDt} then case when mst.space_ACPC_ST_CD in ('03','05','06','07','08') then 1 else 0 end else 0 end as this_all_acpc --평가접수 ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.ACPC_DT,23),7) between #{fromCmplDt} and #{toCmplDt} then case when space_ACPC_ST_CD in ('03', '05', '06') then 1 else 0 end else 0 end as this_acpc --이번달 접수된건 ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.ACPC_DT,23),7) = LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar, DATEADD(M, -1, #{fromCmplDt}+'-01'), 23),7) then case when space_ACPC_ST_CD in ('03','05','06') then 1 else 0 end else 0 end as last_acpc --저번달 접수된 건중 완료가 되지않은 건(이월건) ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.CMPL_DT,23),7) between #{fromCmplDt} and #{toCmplDt} then case when space_ACPC_ST_CD in ('07', '08') then 1 else 0 end else 0 end as this_cmpl --평가완료건 ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.ACPC_DT,23),7) between #{fromCmplDt} and #{toCmplDt} then case when space_ACPC_ST_CD in ('03', '06') then 1 else 0 end else 0 end as this_ing --평가진행 ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.SPACE_DCAC_DT,23),7) between #{fromCmplDt} and #{toCmplDt} then case when space_ACPC_ST_CD = '05' then 1 else 0 end else 0 end as this_drop --평가중단 ,mst.CMPL_WK_DD_CNT ,case when LEFT(CONVERT(nvarchar,mst.CMPL_DT,23),7) between #{fromCmplDt} and #{toCmplDt} then case when space_ACPC_ST_CD in ('07', '08') then CMPL_WK_DD_CNT else 0 end else 0 end as DD_CNT from IRIS_space_RQPR_MST mst inner join IRIS_SPACE_WAY_CRGR crgr on mst.RQPR_ID=crgr.RQPR_ID where 1=1 and mst.del_yn='N' and crgr.del_yn='N' and mst.space_ACPC_ST_CD not in ('00','01','02','04')) main group by main.INFM_PRSN_ID) main2) main3 on ssouser.sa_user=main3.INFM_PRSN_ID where 1=1 and ssouser.sa_dept_new='58162619' and ssouser.sa_func !='FO0'

--getSpaceEvAffrSttsList 평가업무현황 조회
SELECT * FROM (SELECT SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_SCN_ORD ,5 AS ORD ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END)),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END) AS M12 FROM (SELECT SUB1.MON ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_YN ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_ORD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_ORD ,ISNULL(SUB2.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT ALLMON.MON ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,COMCD1.COM_ORD AS SPACE_UGY_ORD ,COMCD2.COM_ORD AS SPACE_SCN_ORD FROM (SELECT 'A' AS COM_DTL_CD ,'전체' AS COM_DTL_NM ,0 AS COM_ORD) COMCD1 ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD2 ,(SELECT MON FROM (SELECT '01' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS MON) MON ) ALLMON WHERE 1=1 AND COMCD2.COM_CD_CD='SPACE_SCN_CD') SUB1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CMPLMON ,'A' AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_SCN_CD ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,'A' AS SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_SCN_CD) SUB2 ON SUB1.MON=SUB2.CMPLMON AND SUB1.SPACE_UGY_YN=SUB2.SPACE_UGY_YN AND SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD=SUB2.SPACE_SCN_CD) MAIN GROUP BY SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_UGY_ORD ,SPACE_SCN_ORD UNION ALL SELECT SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_SCN_ORD ,5 AS ORD ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END)),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END) AS M1
,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END) AS M12 FROM (SELECT SUB1.MON ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_YN ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_ORD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_ORD ,ISNULL(SUB2.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM (SELECT ALLMON.MON ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,COMCD1.COM_ORD AS SPACE_UGY_ORD ,COMCD2.COM_ORD AS SPACE_SCN_ORD FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD1 ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD2 ,(SELECT MON FROM (SELECT '01' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS MON) MON ) ALLMON WHERE 1=1 AND COMCD1.COM_CD_CD='ANL_UGY_YN' AND COMCD2.COM_CD_CD='SPACE_SCN_CD') SUB1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_SCN_CD ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_SCN_CD) SUB2 ON SUB1.MON=SUB2.CMPLMON AND SUB1.SPACE_UGY_YN=SUB2.SPACE_UGY_YN AND SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD=SUB2.SPACE_SCN_CD) MAIN GROUP BY SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_UGY_ORD ,SPACE_SCN_ORD UNION ALL SELECT SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,'A' AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,'평균 완료기간(일)' AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,0 AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,1 AS ORD ,DD_CNT ,CASE WHEN DD_CNT=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(DD_CNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT),1) END AS AVG_DD ,CASE WHEN M1=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM1/CONVERT(FLOAT,M1),1) END AS M1 ,CASE WHEN M2=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM2/CONVERT(FLOAT,M2),1) END AS M2 ,CASE WHEN M3=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM3/CONVERT(FLOAT,M3),1) END AS M3 ,CASE WHEN M4=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM4/CONVERT(FLOAT,M4),1) END AS M4 ,CASE WHEN M5=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM5/CONVERT(FLOAT,M5),1) END AS M5 ,CASE WHEN M6=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM6/CONVERT(FLOAT,M6),1) END AS M6 ,CASE WHEN M7=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM7/CONVERT(FLOAT,M7),1) END AS M7 ,CASE WHEN M8=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM8/CONVERT(FLOAT,M8),1) END AS M8 ,CASE WHEN M9=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM9/CONVERT(FLOAT,M9),1) END AS M9 ,CASE WHEN M10=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM10/CONVERT(FLOAT,M10),1) END AS M10 ,CASE WHEN M11=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM11/CONVERT(FLOAT,M11),1) END AS M11 ,CASE WHEN M12=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(CM12/CONVERT(FLOAT,M12),1) END AS M12 FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(SPACE_UGY_YN,'A') AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,ISNULL(dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('ANL_UGY_YN',SPACE_UGY_YN),'전체') AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(DD_CNT) AS DD_CNT ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END),0) AS M1 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END),0) AS M2 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END),0) AS M3 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END),0) AS M4 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END),0) AS M5 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END),0) AS M6 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END),0) AS M7 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END),0) AS M8 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END),0) AS M9 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END),0) AS M10 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END),0) AS M11 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END),0) AS M12 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM1 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM2 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM3 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM4 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM5 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM6 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM7 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM8 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM9 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM10 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM11 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN DD_CNT END),0) AS CM12 FROM ( SELECT CMPLMON AS MON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SUM(CMPL_WK_DD_CNT) AS DD_CNT ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN) MIAN GROUP BY ROLLUP(SPACE_UGY_YN)) MAIN2 UNION ALL
SELECT ISNULL(SPACE_UGY_YN,'A') AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,ISNULL(dbo.fn_getComDtlNm('ANL_UGY_YN',SPACE_UGY_YN),'전체') AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,'A' AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,'완료 평가건' AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,0 AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,4 AS ORD ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END)),1) AS AVG_CNT ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END),0) AS M1 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END),0) AS M2 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END),0) AS M3 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END),0) AS M4 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END),0) AS M5 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END),0) AS M6 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END),0) AS M7 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END),0) AS M8 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END),0) AS M9 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END),0) AS M10 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END),0) AS M11 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END),0) AS M12 FROM ( SELECT CMPLMON AS MON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN) MIAN GROUP BY ROLLUP(SPACE_UGY_YN) UNION ALL SELECT 'A' AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,'전체' AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,'A' AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,'긴급분석율' AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,0 AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,3 AS ORD ,ROUND(((UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT))*100),1) AS AVG_UCNT ,ROUND((M1+M2+M3+M4+M5+M6+M7+M8+M9+M10+M11+M12)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END)),1) AS AVG_UCNT_MON ,M1 ,M2 ,M3 ,M4 ,M5 ,M6 ,M7 ,M8 ,M9 ,M10 ,M11 ,M12 FROM ( SELECT SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(UCNT) AS UCNT ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M1 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M2 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M3 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M4 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M5 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M6 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M7 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M8 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M9 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M10 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M11 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN UCNT/CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)*100 END),0) AS M12 FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(CMPLMON,'00') AS MON ,COUNT(1) AS CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN SPACE_UGY_YN='U' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS UCNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ) MIAN) MAIN2 UNION ALL
select sub.SPACE_UGY_YN ,sub.SPACE_UGY_NM ,sub.SPACE_SCN_CD ,sub.SPACE_SCN_NM ,sub.SPACE_SCN_ORD ,sub.ORD ,ISNULL(main2.CNT,0) AS CNT ,ISNULL(main2.AVG_CNT,0) AS AVG_CNT ,ISNULL(main2.M1,0) AS M1 ,ISNULL(main2.M2,0) AS M2 ,ISNULL(main2.M3,0) AS M3 ,ISNULL(main2.M4,0) AS M4 ,ISNULL(main2.M5,0) AS M5 ,ISNULL(main2.M6,0) AS M6 ,ISNULL(main2.M7,0) AS M7 ,ISNULL(main2.M8,0) AS M8 ,ISNULL(main2.M9,0) AS M9 ,ISNULL(main2.M10,0) AS M10 ,ISNULL(main2.M11,0) AS M11 ,ISNULL(main2.M12,0) AS M12 from ( select 'A' AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,'전체' AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,'A' AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,'분석 반려건' as SPACE_SCN_NM ,0 AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,6 AS ORD union all select 'A' AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,'전체' AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,'A' AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,'분석 중단건' as SPACE_SCN_NM ,0 AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,6 AS ORD ) sub left join ( SELECT 'A' AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,'전체' AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,'A' AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,CASE WHEN SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD = '04' THEN '분석 반려건' WHEN SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD = '05' THEN '분석 중단건' END AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,0 AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,6 AS ORD ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,ROUND(SUM(CNT)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END)),1) AS AVG_CNT ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END),0) AS M1 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END),0) AS M2 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END),0) AS M3 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END),0) AS M4 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END),0) AS M5 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END),0) AS M6 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END),0) AS M7 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END),0) AS M8 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END),0) AS M9 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END),0) AS M10 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END),0) AS M11 ,ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END),0) AS M12 FROM (SELECT CMPLMON AS MON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(SPACE_GVB_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(SPACE_GVB_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(SPACE_GVB_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD = '04' UNION ALL SELECT LEFT(SPACE_DCAC_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(SPACE_DCAC_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(SPACE_DCAC_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD = '05') RQPRMST --04 반려, 05 중단 GROUP BY SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD, CMPLMON) MAIN GROUP BY SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD) main2 on sub.SPACE_SCN_Nm=main2.SPACE_SCN_Nm) TOTAL_MAIN ORDER BY SPACE_UGY_YN,ORD,SPACE_SCN_ORD

--getSpaceAnlStatList 분석목적별통계 조회
SELECT SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_UGY_CD ,SPACE_SCN_ORD ,CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT) / (SUM(CNT) OVER()) CNT ,SUM(CNT) OVER() AVG_CNT ,CASE WHEN M1=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M1)/SUM(M1) OVER() *100),1) END M1 ,CASE WHEN M2=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M2)/SUM(M2) OVER()*100),1) END M2 ,CASE WHEN M3=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M3)/SUM(M3) OVER()*100),1) END M3 ,CASE WHEN M4=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M4)/SUM(M4) OVER()*100),1) END M4 ,CASE WHEN M5=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M5)/SUM(M5) OVER()*100),1) END M5 ,CASE WHEN M6=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M6)/SUM(M6) OVER()*100),1) END M6 ,CASE WHEN M7=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M7)/SUM(M7) OVER()*100),1) END M7 ,CASE WHEN M8=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M8)/SUM(M8) OVER()*100),1) END M8 ,CASE WHEN M9=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M9)/SUM(M9) OVER()*100),1) END M9 ,CASE WHEN M10=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M10)/SUM(M10) OVER()*100),1) END M10 ,CASE WHEN M11=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M11)/SUM(M11) OVER()*100),1) END M11 ,CASE WHEN M12=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M12)/SUM(M12) OVER()*100),1) END M12 FROM (SELECT ISNULL(SPACE_SCN_CD,'A') AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,ISNULL(SPACE_SCN_NM,'전체') AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,'비율' AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,'AA' AS SPACE_UGY_CD ,ISNULL(SPACE_SCN_ORD,0) AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,5 AS ORD ,ROUND(SUM(CNT),1) AS CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END) AS M12 FROM (SELECT SUB1.MON ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_ORD ,ISNULL(SUB2.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM (SELECT ALLMON.MON ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,COMCD2.COM_ORD AS SPACE_SCN_ORD FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD2 ,(SELECT MON FROM (SELECT '01' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS MON) MON ) ALLMON WHERE 1=1 AND COMCD2.COM_CD_CD='SPACE_SCN_CD') SUB1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CMPLMON ,SPACE_SCN_CD ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ,SPACE_SCN_CD) SUB2 ON SUB1.MON=SUB2.CMPLMON AND SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD=SUB2.SPACE_SCN_CD) MAIN GROUP BY SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_SCN_ORD) MAIN2 UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(SPACE_SCN_CD) = 1 THEN 'A' ELSE SPACE_SCN_CD END AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(SPACE_SCN_CD) = 1 THEN '전체' ELSE MAX(SPACE_SCN_NM) END AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(SPACE_UGY_NM) = 1 THEN '전체' ELSE SPACE_UGY_NM END AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(SPACE_UGY_NM) = 1 THEN 'A' ELSE MAX(SPACE_UGY_YN) END AS SPACE_UGY_CD ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(SPACE_SCN_CD) = 1 THEN 0 ELSE MAX(SPACE_SCN_ORD) END AS SPACE_SCN_ORD ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,ROUND((SUM(CNT)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END))),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(M1) AS M1 ,SUM(M2) AS M2 ,SUM(M3) AS M3 ,SUM(M4) AS M4 ,SUM(M5) AS M5 ,SUM(M6) AS M6 ,SUM(M7) AS M7 ,SUM(M8) AS M8 ,SUM(M9) AS M9 ,SUM(M10) AS M10 ,SUM(M11) AS M11 ,SUM(M12) AS M12 FROM( SELECT SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_ORD ,5 AS ORD ,SUM(CNT) AS CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '01' THEN CNT END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '02' THEN CNT END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '03' THEN CNT END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '04' THEN CNT END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '05' THEN CNT END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '06' THEN CNT END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '07' THEN CNT END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '08' THEN CNT END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '09' THEN CNT END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '10' THEN CNT END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '11' THEN CNT END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON = '12' THEN CNT END) AS M12 FROM (SELECT SUB1.MON ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_YN ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_NM ,SUB1.SPACE_UGY_ORD ,SUB1.SPACE_SCN_ORD ,ISNULL(SUB2.CNT,0) AS CNT FROM (SELECT ALLMON.MON ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_UGY_YN ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_UGY_NM ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_CD AS SPACE_SCN_CD ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_NM AS SPACE_SCN_NM ,COMCD1.COM_ORD AS SPACE_UGY_ORD ,COMCD2.COM_ORD AS SPACE_SCN_ORD FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD1 ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD2 ,(SELECT MON FROM (SELECT '01' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS MON) MON ) ALLMON WHERE 1=1 AND COMCD1.COM_CD_CD='ANL_UGY_YN' AND COMCD2.COM_CD_CD='SPACE_SCN_CD') SUB1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_SCN_CD ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM (SELECT LEFT(CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMON ,SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,CMPL_WK_DD_CNT FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08')) RQPRMST GROUP BY CMPLMON ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_SCN_CD) SUB2 ON SUB1.MON=SUB2.CMPLMON AND SUB1.SPACE_UGY_YN=SUB2.SPACE_UGY_YN AND SUB1.SPACE_SCN_CD=SUB2.SPACE_SCN_CD) MAIN GROUP BY SPACE_SCN_CD ,SPACE_UGY_YN ,SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_NM ,SPACE_UGY_ORD ,SPACE_SCN_ORD) MAIN GROUP BY ROLLUP(SPACE_SCN_CD),ROLLUP(SPACE_UGY_NM) --GROUP BY SPACE_UGY_NM,SPACE_SCN_NM ORDER BY SPACE_SCN_ORD,SPACE_UGY_CD

--getSpaceCrgrStatList 사업부별통계 조회
with ALLDATA as ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT ALLMON.MON ,DEPT.DEPT_CODE ,DEPT.DEPT_NAME ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_CD AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,COMCD1.COM_DTL_NM AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_CD AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,COMCD2.COM_DTL_NM AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,COMCD2.COM_ORD AS SPACE_SCN_ORD FROM IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD1 ,IRIS_ADM_COM_CD COMCD2 ,(select * from IRIS_SSO_DEPT where dept_code in( '50001226' ,'50004199' ,'50005103' ,'58068759' ,'58117903' ,'50008999' ,'50004822' ,'58124813' ,'58179143')) DEPT ,(SELECT MON FROM (SELECT '01' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '02' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '03' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '04' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '05' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '06' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '07' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '08' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '09' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS MON UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS MON) MON ) ALLMON WHERE 1=1 AND COMCD2.COM_CD_CD='SPACE_SCN_CD' AND COMCD1.COM_CD_CD='ANL_UGY_YN') ALLMST LEFT JOIN(SELECT LEFT(MST.CMPL_DT,4) AS CMPLYY ,RIGHT(LEFT(MST.CMPL_DT,7),2) AS CMPLMO ,dbo.fn_getUpperDeptCd(MST.RQPR_DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_CD ,dbo.fn_getUpperDeptNm(MST.RQPR_DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM ,MST.SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD ,MST.SPACE_UGY_YN -- U,C 긴급, 일반 ,MST.SPACE_SCN_CD --R,S,B,M,E 연구,Sec-in, 영업, 마케팅, 기타 ,1 AS CNT ,EXAT_EXP FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_MST MST LEFT JOIN (SELECT RQPR_ID ,SUM(EXAT_EXP) AS EXAT_EXP FROM IRIS_SPACE_RQPR_EXAT WHERE DEL_YN='N' GROUP BY RQPR_ID) EXAT ON MST.RQPR_ID=EXAT.RQPR_ID WHERE 1=1 AND LEFT(MST.CMPL_DT,4)=#{yyyy} AND MST.SPACE_ACPC_ST_CD IN ('07','08') AND MST.DEL_YN='N') SUB ON ALLMST.MON=SUB.CMPLMO AND ALLMST.ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD=SUB.SPACE_SCN_CD AND ALLMST.DEPT_CODE=SUB.DEPT_CD AND ALLMST.ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN=SUB.SPACE_UGY_YN) SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,'분석구분' AS GBN ,'' AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,'' AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,SPACE_SCN_ORD ,4 AS ORD ,SUM(ISNULL(CNT,0)) AS CNT ,ROUND((ISNULL(SUM(CNT),0)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END))),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='01' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='02' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='03' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='04' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='05' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='06' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='07' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='08' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='09' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='10' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='11' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='12' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M12 FROM ALLDATA WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ALLDATA.DEPT_CODE ,ALLDATA.DEPT_NAME ,ALLDATA.ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,ALLDATA.ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,ALLDATA.SPACE_SCN_ORD UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(DEPT_CODE)=1 THEN '0' ELSE MAX(DEPT_CODE) END AS DEPT_CODE ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(DEPT_CODE)=1 THEN CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN '전체' ELSE MAX(ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM) END ELSE MAX(DEPT_NAME) END AS DEPT_NAME ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(DEPT_CODE)=1 THEN CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN '전체' ELSE MAX(ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM) END ELSE MAX(DEPT_NAME) END ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN CASE WHEN GROUPING(DEPT_CODE)=1 THEN '전체' ELSE '합계' END ELSE MAX(ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM) END AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN CASE WHEN GROUPING(DEPT_CODE)=1 THEN '전체' ELSE '합계' END ELSE MAX(ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM) END AS GBN ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN 'A' ELSE MAX(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN) END AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN '전체' ELSE MAX(ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM) END AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,'0' ,CASE WHEN GROUPING(ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN)=1 THEN CASE WHEN GROUPING(DEPT_CODE)=1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ELSE 3 END AS ORD ,SUM(ISNULL(CNT,0)) AS CNT ,ROUND((ISNULL(SUM(CNT),0)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END))),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='01' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='02' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='03' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='04' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='05' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='06' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='07' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='08' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='09' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='10' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='11' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='12' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M12 FROM ALLDATA WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ROLLUP(ALLDATA.DEPT_CODE) ,ROLLUP(ALLDATA.ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN) UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,'사업부비율' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,'분석구분' AS GBN ,ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,'' ,ORD ,ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)/SUM(CNT) OVER()),1) AS CNT ,'' AS AVG_CNT ,CASE WHEN M1=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M1)/SUM(M1) OVER()),1) END AS M1 ,CASE WHEN M2=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M2)/SUM(M2) OVER()),1) END AS M2 ,CASE WHEN M3=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M3)/SUM(M3) OVER()),1) END AS M3 ,CASE WHEN M4=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M4)/SUM(M4) OVER()),1) END AS M4 ,CASE WHEN M5=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M5)/SUM(M5) OVER()),1) END AS M5 ,CASE WHEN M6=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M6)/SUM(M6) OVER()),1) END AS M6 ,CASE WHEN M7=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M7)/SUM(M7) OVER()),1) END AS M7 ,CASE WHEN M8=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M8)/SUM(M8) OVER()),1) END AS M8 ,CASE WHEN M9=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M9)/SUM(M9) OVER()),1) END AS M9 ,CASE WHEN M10=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M10)/SUM(M10) OVER()),1) END AS M10 ,CASE WHEN M11=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M11)/SUM(M11) OVER()),1) END AS M11 ,CASE WHEN M12=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M12)/SUM(M12) OVER()),1) END AS M12 FROM ( SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,'전체' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,'전체' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,'분석구분' AS GBN ,'' ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,'' ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,3 AS ORD ,SUM(ISNULL(CNT,0)) AS CNT ,ROUND((ISNULL(SUM(CNT),0)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END))),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='01' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='02' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='03' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='04' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='05' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='06' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='07' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='08' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='09' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='10' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='11' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='12' THEN CNT ELSE 0 END) AS M12 FROM ALLDATA WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ALLDATA.DEPT_CODE ,ALLDATA.DEPT_NAME) MAIN2 UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,'전체' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,'총액' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,'비용' AS GBN ,'' AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,'' AS ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,0 SPACE_SCN_ORD ,5 AS ORD ,SUM(ISNULL(EXAT_EXP,0)) AS CNT ,ROUND((ISNULL(SUM(CNT),0)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END))),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='01' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='02' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='03' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='04' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='05' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='06' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='07' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='08' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='09' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='10' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='11' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='12' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M12 FROM ALLDATA WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ALLDATA.DEPT_CODE ,ALLDATA.DEPT_NAME UNION ALL SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,'사업부비율액수' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,'비용' AS GBN ,ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,'' ,ORD ,ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,CNT)/SUM(CNT) OVER()),1) AS CNT ,'' as AVG_CNT ,CASE WHEN M1=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M1)/SUM(M1) OVER()),1) END AS M1 ,CASE WHEN M2=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M2)/SUM(M2) OVER()),1) END AS M2 ,CASE WHEN M3=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M3)/SUM(M3) OVER()),1) END AS M3 ,CASE WHEN M4=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M4)/SUM(M4) OVER()),1) END AS M4 ,CASE WHEN M5=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M5)/SUM(M5) OVER()),1) END AS M5 ,CASE WHEN M6=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M6)/SUM(M6) OVER()),1) END AS M6 ,CASE WHEN M7=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M7)/SUM(M7) OVER()),1) END AS M7 ,CASE WHEN M8=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M8)/SUM(M8) OVER()),1) END AS M8 ,CASE WHEN M9=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M9)/SUM(M9) OVER()),1) END AS M9 ,CASE WHEN M10=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M10)/SUM(M10) OVER()),1) END AS M10 ,CASE WHEN M11=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M11)/SUM(M11) OVER()),1) END AS M11 ,CASE WHEN M12=0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND((CONVERT(FLOAT,M12)/SUM(M12) OVER()),1) END AS M12 FROM ( SELECT DEPT_CODE ,DEPT_NAME ,'전체' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_CD ,'전체' AS ALL_SPACE_SCN_NM ,'' ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN ,'' ALL_SPACE_UGY_NM ,6 AS ORD ,SUM(ISNULL(EXAT_EXP,0)) AS CNT ,ROUND((ISNULL(SUM(CNT),0)/CONVERT(FLOAT,(CASE WHEN #{yyyy}= year(getdate()) THEN datename(m, getdate()) ELSE 12 END))),1) AS AVG_CNT ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='01' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M1 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='02' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M2 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='03' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M3 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='04' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M4 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='05' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M5 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='06' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M6 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='07' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M7 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='08' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M8 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='09' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M9 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='10' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M10 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='11' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M11 ,SUM(CASE WHEN MON='12' THEN EXAT_EXP ELSE 0 END) AS M12 FROM ALLDATA WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ALLDATA.DEPT_CODE ,ALLDATA.DEPT_NAME) MAIN4 ORDER BY DEPT_CODE,ORD, ALL_SPACE_UGY_YN,SPACE_SCN_ORD
